definition: to exceed/to overtake/to surpass/to transcend/to pass/to cross/ultra-/super-

sentences.english: Objective To observe the value of color Doppler flow imaging (CDFI)in finding the reasons of lower extremity with venous engorgement (LEVE).
sentences.chinese: 目的探討彩超在診斷下肢靜脈曲張症原因中的價值。

sentences.english: Objective To assess the value of color Doppler sonography in the diagnosis of the thrombosis in artificial blood vessels.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討彩超對人工血管內血栓形成的診斷價值。

sentences.english: Colour duplex ultrasonography showed DVT extending from the left external iliac vein to the foretibial vein.
sentences.chinese: 多普勒彩超顯示左側髂外靜脈至脛前靜脈段DVT。

sentences.english: Objective To differentiate the diagnosis of acute testitis and testis distortion.
sentences.chinese: 目的用彩超鑑別急性睾丸炎和睾丸扭轉。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the diagnostic value of CDFI to kidney malignant tumor.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討彩超對腎惡性腫瘤的價值。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the value of high frequency color ultrasound in the diagnosis of breast disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討高頻彩超對乳腺疾病的診斷價值。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the efficacy of color ultrasound-guided interventional treatment for popliteal cyst.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討彩超引導下膕窩囊腫介入治療的價值。

sentences.english: Objective To explore clinical value of color Doppler flow imaging(CDFI) for diagnosis of abruptio placentae.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討彩超診斷胎盤早剝的臨牀價值。

sentences.english: Conclusion Color echocardiography can be used routinely in diagnosis of congenital heart disease of cyanotic neonates.
sentences.chinese: 結論彩超可作爲青紫新生兒先心病的常規篩查手段。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo evaluate color Doppler ultrasound screening in the prenatal diagnosis of fetal cardiac malformations in value.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討彩超篩查在產前診斷胎兒心臟畸形中的價值。

sentences.english: The correlation between carotid ultrasonography and coronary angiography severity of CAD was analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析冠心病頸動脈彩超和冠狀動脈造影的相關性關係。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the experience of the application of colour doppler ultrasonography in diagnosis of cerv icofacial soft tissues tumors.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結面頸部軟組織腫瘤彩超的診斷經驗。

sentences.english: Conclusion Transabdominal colour doppler ultrasound is an important preliminary screening in the diagnosis of colonic tumor.
sentences.chinese: 結論經腹彩超可作爲結腸腫瘤的重要初篩手段。

definition: biopsy/abbr. for 活體組織檢查|活体组织检查[huo2 ti3 zu3 zhi1 jian3 cha2]
to do a blood test/to have one's blood tested
abbr. for 產前檢查|产前检查[chan3 qian2 jian3 cha2]
